dict.acceptation: 休息厅；客厅；（机场等的）等候室；
懒洋洋地打发（时间）；虚度光阴；

sent.orig: LUNA Lounge is a cocktail lounge behind LUCE with chill out music and lazy spirit.
sent.trans: 潞娜酒吧不仅提供慵懒的跳舞音乐和好喝的酒水，更重要的是，一天的辛勤工作后，在这里你可以找到最狂纵的释放和最轻松的心情。

sent.orig: He arrives in 2:30, and is told to wait in the very important person lounge.
sent.trans: 他在两点半到达，并被告知在要人休息室等候。

sent.orig: Jason has just gone to work and Kurt, Melissa and Allison are sitting in the lounge.
The difference is in floor, amenities, access to club lounge and, of course, the price.
sent.trans: 所不同的是在地板、设施和俱乐部休息室的入口，当然还有价格。

sent.orig: The Pontalba Lounge was on the hotel's main floor.
sent.trans: 旁塔尔酒吧位于饭店的底层。
